newsitem.title: USA: ALPNET and Richter to localize RAM 2000.
newsitem.headline: ALPNET and Richter to localize RAM 2000.

text.p: Richter Systems Inc said Tuesday that it reached agreement with ALPNET Inc for the localization of its RAMS 2000 Retail Automated Merchandising System into Dutch, French and German.
RAMS 2000, a back office retail system, features the Oracle7 RDBMS, Oracle Web Application Server, as well as Oracle CASE tool Developer/2000, ALPNET said.
ALPNET said it can be interfaced with Richter's SEWN 2000 to provide the only complete Oracle-based, client/server supply chain solution for the softgoods and retailing industries.
